snippet.title: Proun+ Nintendo 3DS release trailer
snippet.description: Proun+ is now available for Nintendo 3DS(tm)! Proun+ is not just another racing game: Proun does things you do not expect. Instead of that same neon graphics so many racing games have, you get abstract art. Instead of driving a car, you control a rolling ball. Instead of that same cliched techno music, it has groovy jazz-rock. Instead of having just one game mode, it has five modes that are mixed into more than 100 challenges. Proun+ brings you into a unique flow, a meditation of hardcore racing. Proun+ is fast: on the highest difficulty it is so dizzyingly fast you will shock yourself if you manage to win. Beware: as soon as you start playing, you’re hooked!
